verse:
यस्मात् परं नापरमस्ति किंचिद्यस्मान्नणीयो न ज्यायोऽस्ति कश्चित्‌।
वृक्ष इव स्तब्धो दिवि तिष्ठत्येकस्तेनेदं पूर्णं पुरुषेण सर्वम्‌॥
meaning: Translation:Because there is nothing higher or lower than that, nothing smaller or bigger, just as a tree stands steady in the sky alone, through that person everything is complete.
